pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Fresh It Up Regular Dry Shampoo 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Got2b Fresh It Up Dry Shampoo Extra Fresh Clean & Crisp offers instant fresh, removes excess oil and long-lasting fragrance.

Look fresh in no time! Refresh your style between washes in an instant with got2b Fresh it Up extra fresh dry shampoo. It quickly cleans & refreshes your hair, leaving it with a flirty citrus fragrance that lasts all day long. This extra fresh dry shampoo leaves no white residue (after brushing).

Be fresh, style fresh!

All-day fragrance.

No white residue (after brushing).

Size: 200mL

Warnings

Solvent abuse can kill instantly.

FLAMMABLE WARNING

Danger. Extremely flammable aerosol. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Do not pierce or burn, even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C. Keep out of reach of children. Read label before use. Use in well ventilated place. Do not spray into eyes. Do not inhale intentionally.

Ingredients

Butane, Propane, Alcohol denat., Oryza Sativa Starch, Isobutane, Pentane, Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Cetrimonium Chloride, Benzyl Alcohol, Citronellol, Citral.

Directions

Apply on dry hair, hold can 20cm away from head, section hair & spray into roots. Use in short bursts. Using your fingertips, massage head thoroughly to distribute & then brush. Now your style is extra fresh for another day!
Shake me well before & during use.
Make it last:
To keep your dry shampoo fresh, always close time cap and store in a dry place. If nozzle clogs, run it under warm water and then dry it thoroughly before use.
